text: For the purposes of this part, the term:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-262, see notes following § 7-2231.01.

DC CODE § 7-2231.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Agency" means the Homeland Security and Emergency Management Agency.
"Director" means the Director of the Homeland Security and Emergency Management Agency.
"Program" means the Homeland Security Program created by § 7-2231.03.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
